tool_description: grabs all events and event data from AAC dallas website
title: American Airlines Center Dallas

api_list.name: calendar page events
api_list.description: gets the events featured on the calendar page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://american-airlines-center-dallas.p.rapidapi.com/events"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-airlines-center-dallas.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all https requests
api_list.description: holds all 3 button clicks worth of events in the form of https request generated by loading more events
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://american-airlines-center-dallas.p.rapidapi.com/tutorial"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-airlines-center-dallas.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
